field.filter: SELECT Person AS p WHERE p.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPConfig AS c WHERE c.org_id = :this->org_id

SELECT Organization AS o JOIN IPConfig AS ipc ON ipc.org_id = o.id WHERE ipc.delegate_to_children_only = 'dtc_no' AND o.id != :this->org_id UNION SELECT Organization AS o JOIN Organization AS child ON child.parent_id BELOW STRICT o.id JOIN IPConfig AS ipc ON ipc.org_id = o.id WHERE child.id = :this->org_id AND ipc.delegate_to_children_only = 'dtc_yes'
SELECT IPv4Block AS b WHERE IF (:this->parent_org_id = 0, b.org_id = :this->org_id, b.org_id = :this->parent_org_id)
SELECT IPv4Block AS b WHERE b.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPRangeUsage AS r WHERE r.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv4Subnet AS s WHERE s.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Domain AS d WHERE d.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPUsage AS i WHERE i.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv4Subnet AS s WHERE s.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv4Range AS r WHERE r.subnet_id = :this->subnet_id AND r.org_id = :this->org_id

profile.name: Hostmaster
profile.description: Person handling the IP space and looking after the IP changes

profile.name: CMDB Guest
profile.description: Person with read only rights (no bulk read allowed) on CMDB and IP objects (only)
